ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bards forgotten again....
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Bards will be added to this site at a later date, but we here at B&F think that their melee skills aren t really what defines them, as such they are the
ygData.messageBody:
>this time not by verant , but by the people at Gameznet

"Bards will be added to this site at a later date, but we here at B&F think
that their melee skills aren't really what defines them, as such they are
the last to be written about."

In other words, dear old Platt doesn't have a clue how Bards are played and
is neatly dodging the issue.

I read a few of his articles. I didn't see anything that was written
objectively, which put me off lickety-split. Take a look at "How to get
your FBSS"... it's a novel approach, guiding a player using screenshots, but
it just doesn't work. A map would have put over in one page what he tried
in 16 screenshots. Admittedly, it's nice to see a screenshot of the room in
question but a map would have been more effective. I think it's safe to say
I won't be visiting that site again.

Besides, we've already got EQSongs and The Concert Hall. What more do we
need? :)
